Many time-lines in existence share numerous similarities and this particular one is no different as in others there exists a young blonde woman named Noel Vermillion, an easily emotional gunslinger who because of what she really was became the target of a certain green-haired suit wearing man that she knew only as Hazama (his true name being Terumi Yuki).

Upon her capture Hazama attempted to unleash Noel's true potential in hopes of plunging the world into eternal despair...however in some strange twist of fate that even Terumi himself could not have foreseen it was not despair that Noel unleashed...it was fat!

Hazama had believed that she had the power to become the perfect living weapon, a god killer if you will, instead the fedora-wearing villain practically flipped his shit as an absurd amount of blubber poured out of the young woman's once so lithe form. He had no time to react before he was swamped over by her seemingly endless tons of soft creamy blubber and he was only the first to feel Noel's surging girth her humongous rolls and handles not to mention every other part of her being spreading through every part of The 13th Hierarchical City "Kagutsuchi" as she effortlessly engulfed the entirety of the town with so much of herself.

Noel herself was unaware of this startling change only much later would she awaken to realize that Kagutsuchi was no more and in it's place was a grand city-sized Noel Vermillion!

Afterwards no one really opposed the idea of renaming the city after the mountainous blonde especially after she had decided that everyone should continue living out their lives on her gargantuan flab. Surprisingly the NOL did not step in, strangely the current Imperator Librarius along with Hazama seemingly disappeared after Noel's tremendous fat flooded over Kagutsuchi, some with an understandable hatred for Terumi believed they were still out there, somewhere...

That said life began anew and while it was her idea Noel was still a bit unnerved whenever it clicked in her head that she was truly the size of a grand city! Still she had her friends to help and support her and on this day after she had awaken from her slumber Noel felt the sensation of someone approaching her still adorable yet fat-surrounded face.

11533212.content:
Noel stirred, yawning as she awoke. It was a small, rather cute yawn that contrasted with how heavily the city-sized beauty had slept, small tears forming in the corners of her eyes as she closed them. Even at this size, her fat arms had managed to reach up close to her face, but were still stubby from all the flowing fat in her body. Noel's emerald-green eyes were half closed as they focused, a figure approaching her. The shape seemed somewhat recognizable, but it seemed different.

"Did you sleep well?" A friendly, albeit somewhat teasing, female voice rang out.

"Ts-Tsubaki...?" Noel asked sleepily. She was still groggy and she had to try and stifle another yawn as she looked at the figure in front of her. The woman held her ground and took a firm stance, holding her hat in place from the rush of wind as Noel yawned once more.

Indeed, it was Tsubaki. She was still wearing her NOL uniform, but for some reason it was black. Noel's eyes focused more as she opened them up and was she surprised. Since she last saw her, Tsubaki had become rather plump, having gained at least a good 80lbs since they last met.

"What...what happened to you, Tsubaki?" Noel asked, of course. Her voice was still a bit tired, as she was, but she was mostly awake now.

"O-oh well Izayoi went out of control at one point, thanks to Hazama. My uniform changed after it happened, but I snapped back when I saw-"

For some reason, Tsubaki froze in place as she spoke.

"Or, do you mean my new figure? W-well I just took to eating a lot after I broke free of Izayoi and...after I came to terms about Major Kisaragi"

Noel didn't know what she should rightly be feeling at this moment. Tsubaki had been trying to kill her recently, but had finally come back to terms. Somehow, she was back. Her dear, dear friend was once more.

Tsubaki smiled as she looked at Noel's face, the city-sized girl's brilliant gold hair blowing in the wind brilliantly. She carefully tread up Noel's flab, climbing on her hands and knees towards her face. Unsure what to think at first, blushing as she got the wrong idea, Tsubaki gently took Noel's hair, pinned it back and then placed Noel's old blue beret back on her head.

"You're not with NOL anymore but...you always did look nice like this." Tsubaki said with a smile.

Noel blushed, smiling shyly as she looked appreciatively at her old friend with her large, innocent eyes.

While Noel's smile made her heart skip a beat, and Makoto was certainly happy since she had eaten the last of her snacks, Tsubaki was a bit confused.

"Noel, uh, didn't we just eat a few minutes ago?" Tsubaki asked politely, a drop of sweat flowing down the back of her head as she poked her still partially swollen stomach.

Noel's bright eye nervously shifted to the side as she pouted shyly.

"W-well I...I got hungry again..." She confessed with embarrassment, her cheeks flushing. She always made sure to keep herself well-fed, lest this city-sized girl's rumbling belly cause an earthquake for her denizens.

Tsubaki sighed, looking down at her stomach. She decided she could eat another bite or two, plus she didn't mind gaining much more weight. If anything, it would help her get that much closer to her beloved Noel. Makoto however was just happy to eat and before she could see, the energetic squirrel had already latched herself onto Noel's thick neck and puffy face, Noel crying out from how sudden it was and how Makoto's breasts and belly squished against her. As shocking as it was, she admitted that the feeling of another person's fat body against her own felt pleasant. Maybe if Tsubaki gained more weight...

The thought of asking her was too embarrassing, making her face flush even though Makoto had pulled herself off (with some urging by Tsubaki, but nonetheless) which neither of the two noticed because they were busy talking among themselves.

The food came shortly, once again brought in huge portions for Noel with some normal sized dishes brought for Tsubaki and Makoto. Tsubaki herself mused that maybe they should bring an extra Noel-sized dish if they were to quell Makoto's appetite, which made her squirrel friend puff up her cheeks and flick her tail.

Tsubaki groaned inside. How was is possible for one person to be this cute!? She couldn't tear her eyes away even as she ate while she watched Noel happily stuff her mouth full of food, accompanied by childlike happy cooing as she ate with a wide smile. Her heart felt tight as she had to learn forward and hold down a groan for some reason as she observed Noel happily eating her second breakfast.

Makoto herself showed as big an appetite as ever, devouring and slurping up food like she had been starving for days, letting crumbs and broth stick to her face and even fall down onto her person, staining her top and her plump belly.

Tsubaki finally managed to tear herself away from Noel, her gaze fixated on Makoto. If she got thicker, like her friend, if she got fatter would Noel...would she like it? This tough, while it started out as passing, began to get taken out of context by Tsubaki's affection. What was a query became a possibility and then a goal. What started out as "Would Noel like it if I got fatter?" became "I must get fatter for Noel!"

At that thought, her stomach felt less bloated and Tsubaki began to tear into her food. Noel herself was surprised. As long as she knew, Tsubaki always had a humble and well-mannered approach when she ate her food, but now she was tearing right in. To make things even more surprising...

"Oh look at you, Tsubaki."

The redhead paused momentarily, a dry string of noodle hanging from her lips.

"I get what you're doing." Makoto stated amusingly with her usual toothy grin.

"Huh?" Tsubaki felt another cough stir up as she glanced over in her furry friend's direction, "What are you talking about, Makoto?"

After her cough had subsided she attempted to fight off her returning blush, a part of her wondering if Makoto had indeed guessed correctly? She knew from their shared past that while the squirrel-girl could be rather ditzy at times she wasn't one to underestimate Makoto's actual intelligence.

"If you wanted to have an eat-off then you should have just said so."

That was exactly right...wait, what? Had she just heard right or were nerves affecting her hearing?

"An eat-off...as in a competition?" Tsubaki asked with a rather puzzled expression hoping Makoto would clarify and that she hadn't heard incorrectly.

"Yup Yup! The way you're finally cutting loose, Tsubaki, I figured you must be wanting to out eat me." Makoto explained with a large smile as she dug into a fresh bowl of nuts.

"Because you know...it's kind of impossible do the same with Noel." she added in later having swallowed a few yet her speech was still muttered due to at least half still being housed inside her mouth.

Noel giggling slightly at her friend's always amusing antics while Tsubaki sat unsure as to how to proceed. On one hand Makoto had miss-guessed but on the other this possible contest between the two of them could be what she needed to meet her goal of plumping up out of her love for Noel.

'Well this certainly wasn't what I had in mind but...' her thoughts interrupted as she watched Noel laugh away at Makoto's ridiculous nature even as she stuffed her mouth to brim with all sorts of food. Smiling Tsubaki knew what she had to do.

"Alright Makoto I agree to taking part in this friendly competition."

"You will?" Makoto joyfully asked swallowing whatever it was that currently resided in her mouth, "Great! But you should know already Tsubaki I take any sort of competition seriously so if you want to beat me you're going to have to bring your A Game."

Instinctively Makoto pounded her fists together while Noel, busy eating her own specific portions, cheered. The two of them were so happy so much so that Tsubaki couldn't help but join in sharing a laughter of her own.

"You're on then." she stated with a rare smile of confidence.

Noel watched in awe as her best of friends, in Tsubaki's case new found lover as well, eyed the new helpings of food afterwards they stared at one another and perhaps for old times sake recited the oath belonging to the NOL.

Not a moment later did the competition between friends truly begin...

Captain Hazama wanted her to capture and apprehend Noel Vermillion, his reasons at the time unknown, but even after clashing here of all places Tsubaki could not bring herself to strike down Noel.

The Captain would eventually get his wish of capturing Noel and only through their bond, and a little help from a certain squirrel, did Tsubaki find the strength to confront Hazama now known to her as Terumi Yuuki. Even with her weapon, Izayoi sapping her of her "light"(eyesight) she still bought Ragna The Bloodedge enough time to free Noel.

Like the viper that he was Terumi escaped shortly there afterwards Tsubaki far too exhausted to give chase instead Ragna continued on in her place leaving an equally drained Noel to her safety, at some point from what she gathered her old flame Jin Kisaragi was also after Terumi and who knows where those three currently were...

As the days have gone by Tsubaki has also placed aside her training with Izayoi due to it's unique ability she has begun to look for a way to master the weapon without losing one of her senses in the process.

All of this however has let to the redhead putting on a bit of weight, unsure if Noel has noticed but even if she had Tsubaki was confident the blonde was far too shy to point out her increased size. "Racheeeelll~! Y-you're not mad a-*BUUUUUUUUURRRP!!!* N-not mad at me are you...?" Lambda muttered, the booze making her brain a bit on the bipolar side as she worried she had alienated her friend.

"Wh-what? No, no no, I-I'm not mad Lambda, just...take some consideration into your actions. Have some tact."

"O-okaaay..." Lambda muttered.

The two did not talk much after that. Lambda found herself busy getting distracted by the sights, looking at the lights all around her in a brilliant display, occasionally drinking an ale or a bottle of scotch from her share of the liquor crates stored on her person. Rachel felt like she was carrying two literal tanks on her chest as her pert breasts bounced and jiggled with every step. The vampire vowed to herself that she would make some form of reinforced, elastic nursing bra for her new assets. Heavens above knew she could use it.

She found herself standing outside of the room she was sharing with Lambda and Ragna, clumsily wobbling the door handle with her chubby hand before she could grasp it and appropriately open it. Slowly, Rachel lumbered forward before collapsing onto the giant, plush bed with a sigh as she felt the pressure leaving her fatty feet.

"Aaaaaahhhh~! This is exactly what I needed...~" The fatty rabbit cooed as she tried once more to wiggle her fatty toes. "Ooohh, all that's missing is a warm tub of water to dunk them in and a couple handmaidens to massage them..."

Lambda yawned, slowly moving forward as she leaned onto the bed as best she could fit, her huge blubbery belly colliding with Rachel's, causing her to squeak as the other blond blob lay beside her, wrapping her huge pillowy pillars known as her arms around her as best as they could reach.

"Wh-what are you...?"

"You're my...best friend Rachel...bestie...best best..." Lambda muttered drunkenly as she felt her consciousness wane before yawning, slowly drifting off to sleep. Rachel sighed. She wanted to get up but...she felt not disturbing the lumbering lard laden lady beside her took precedence.

About twenty minutes later, Ragna returned to the room, sighing as he held his coat in his hand. It had been so long since he got the damn thing washed that he was finally glad to see a laundromat that DIDN'T have his wanted poster in the window. It was almost like he'd just bought a new one, it felt so much cleaner and softer.

When he opened the door, his jaw dropped as he saw the massive meaty mountains of Rachel and Lambda hugging right before him. The two of them cooed and hummed softly in their sleep, both blobs blushing bashfully with each other's company.

"Heh...guess they do get along pretty well..." Ragna muttered to himself. Considering the situation before him, he decided the best thing he could do was sleep on the couch.

info.brief_description: The women of BlazBlue face some interesting situations in new time loops.
info.description:
I haven't found a weight gain story for BlazBlue on this site so I figured why not make one of my own?! May as well since such a great fighting game with well designed ladies, like many others, deserves a story where fans can feel free to fatten their favourite girl to their whims!

Remember, make your chapters well written: No paragraph long chapters and use good grammar and no extreme OOC. But either way, go nuts guys; your imagination is the limit!

Speaking of, I'll allow futa (dickgirls) for those who wish, slobby behavior, no scat, vomiting or peeing though, no characters dying, but I will allow for soft vore by some request.

But yeah ASIDE FROM THOSE RULES you guys are free to go nuts and make the girls big as you like. Item is rated 18+ so sex is a-okay :D
